mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_menu ORDER BY sort_order ASC, id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu (parent_id, menu_name, menu_type, path, component, permission, icon, sort_order, visible, status) VALUES (#{parentId}, #{menuName}, #{menuType}, #{path}, #{component}, #{permission}, #{icon}, #{sortOrder}, #{visible}, #{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET parent_id = #{parentId}, menu_name = #{menuName}, menu_type = #{menuType}, path = #{path}, component = #{component}, permission = #{permission}, icon = #{icon}, sort_order = #{sortOrder}, visible = #{visible}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
